cloneIfNotExists.description: Whether to automatically clone repositories if they don't exist locally

pullIfExists.description: Whether to pull latest changes if repository already exists (default: true)

noArchived.description: Whether to exclude archived repositories from processing (default: false)

repositories.description: List of git repositories to manage

no-commits.description: Whether to exclude commits when displaying contributors

format.description: Output format: 'json' for machine-readable JSON, 'text' for human-readable format

path.description: Local path where the repository should be located (can be empty)

name.description: Display name for the repository (can be empty)

archived.description: Whether this repository is archived (default: false)
